lodestone.title: Co-Founder & Lead Developer
lodestone.description: Spearheaded a multi-functional team of 12 in the creation of an open-source game server hosting tool that has garnered over 500 stars, more than 6000 downloads, and a dedicate user base of over 500 monthly users. Conceptualized and built an extension system powered by a modified and multithreaded Deno runtime. Managed external integrations and sponsorship talks. Invited to one of the biggest Rust-lang podcast.

haven.title: Tools Developer Intern
haven.description: Took initiative in the development of an internal code quality analysis tool, which has since been integrated into the studio's CI pipeline. Built a web-based dashboard to visualize and analyze the results of said tool. Worked closely with programmers and artists to develop plugins and tools to improve the workflow of the studio.

ford.title: Software Developer Intern
ford.description: Added support for SVG filter effects to a custom renderer for the SYNC-4 infotainment system. Optimized the rendering pipeline to improve performance and reduce memory usage.

htn2021.title: Campus Goose Tracker
htn2021.description: Developed a mobile app to spot and track geese on campus. Used machine learning to identify geese in images.

carfax.title: Android Developer Intern
carfax.description: Created composable and responsive UI components for an unreleased Android app. Implemented a driving mode detection service.
